short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful video tools for Instagram on PC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A useful video extension for viewing Instagram reels on PC.
Adds default video controls and extra key controls.
's' - Slows down video by 0.5
'd' - Speeds up video by 0.5
'r' - Resets video speed to 1.0x
'g' - Sets video speed to 2.0x
'm' - Toggles mute
